Reviews.Title: “Easy access to I 10”
Reviews.Author: cougertown
Reviews.Content: Big clean room, friendly people. I will bee back again

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price.”
Reviews.Author: MrsCamama
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Budget Inn overnight and I suppose I can sum it up by saying it was OK. I liked how big it was, I liked the bed except the part where I found popcorn under the blanket. The room was warm and had a fridge and microwave as well as cable and free wifi which is nice. I did not like how dirty the carpet was, also had a pullout bed/sofa in my room and it was just disgustingly dirty. The tub in the restroom was rusty and cruddy as well but other than that I suppose it's a good place to rest your head for the night. Not for extended use.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: dusty3818
Reviews.Content: Seems I stayed in a different motel than the rest of the reviews. Everyone we come in contact with at the motel was very helpful. Rooms were clean. Furniture in good condition, everything worked. Excellent stay for the $$. Close to PIR. Definetly a "two thumbs up". Motel in a safe area of town. Can't say enough good stuff about our stay there. Upon leaving I did make reservations for next year's race weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Borderline cheap hotel”
Reviews.Author: matth45
Reviews.Content: This place was very cheap. As you might expect from the name, that is it's best quality. The room was very basic, but comfortable. It had a fridge and microwave, which was nice. Unfortunately, even though we had a non-smoking room, the room smelled faintly like cigarettes. The entire hallway outside the room smelled strongly of cigarette smoke. The hotel stupidly interleaves smoking and non-smoking rooms right next door to each other, so there's no way to get a room far away from a smoking room. The staff was very nice though, and it has a pool and hot tub which seemed clean. The continental was breakfast was nothing: just coffee, Cheerios and milk.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Would Not Recommend!!”
Reviews.Author: unicorntk71
Reviews.Content: This hotel was aweful, it stunk so bad, when we walked back in after dinner it spealt like someone was cooking cat urine in their chinese food!! We were suppose to be in a non smoking room and our room spelt so bad of smoke it was like they were blowing smoke straight into our room, when we got home our clothes spealt terrible. The air conditioner didn't blow out cold air let alone hardly any air at all. I wouldn't have paid $35 let alone $50 for this place, I've staid at places alot cheaper that were 3 times better

Reviews.Title: “Not the best”
Reviews.Author: CBinAZ
Reviews.Content: The first room I was given the toilet and telephone did not work. There were two used hand towels hanging on the shower curtain rod. After notifying the front desk clerk, he was very accomodating and moved me to another room. The door on the second room was not closed when I went to it, so I was a little concerned. The rooms are in need of updates. The carpet and bedspread were worn and seemed dirty. Complimentary "breakfast" was coffee and 5 dried out mini muffins. I probably would not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Daf8484
Reviews.Content: The Budget Inn is a cost efficient place and decent place to stay. It is good place for you and your spouse to get away for a little bit.

Reviews.Title: “Great budget overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: eezern
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel & didn't expect it to be much as it was just an overnight stay to recoup after travelling in from Scotland. The hotel's exterior was pretty much as expected, the streets & carpark were clean if somewhat deserted. The lobby was clean as was the room. It even had a fridge which surprised me. It's not situated downtown but we needed to be close to the airport to pick up our rental car in the morning. We did struggle to find a place within ten minutes walk to have a bite to eat and ended up in Hooters! Oh well!. We had no hassle getting back to our room, had a good night's sleep (despite the rather loud air con unit) and even had complimentary coffee & pastry in the lobby before we left in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “OMG!!!Stay away from this Budget Inn Phoenix, Mcdowell rd”
Reviews.Author: travelingfaraway
Reviews.Content: We were in Phoenix for Barrett Jackson Car Show and booked this place online. We walked into a room where we saw cockroaches and stained bedsheets, really bad stained bedsheets I had to ask for new sheets which had holes in them. and there was no blanket so we asked for that to and it also had holes. The sheets on the bed were never washed or changed from seeing the stain. I did show the girl at the desk and she was shocked to. I had to change the sheets myself. Don't stay there, it's really really dirty. We couldn't go anywhere else because we had prepaid for it online. But Hotels.com say to call them and they will relocate you but we didn't know that till after the trip.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: JonGoWest
Reviews.Content: This hotel is horrible. They rent rooms by the week to drug addicts and by the hour to prostitutes. The bathroom smelled of mildew and was unclean. There were no blankets and the towels were old. The "contiental breakfast" was a few old danishes and bad coffee. Nothing else. Only the lobby is somewhat nice but it closes at 7pm and does not open up again until 7am. That is either because the neighborhood is so bad or they can't get anyone to work here. Not sure, probably both. No matter the price stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “gave our room away, lost our stuff”
Reviews.Author: jethawkfan
Reviews.Content: We had a confirmed reservation for a 2 day stay. When we left to go to a baseball game on the first day, we came back late in the evening to find someone else in our room, and all of our belongings in the "lost and found". It took us over an hour to get our things back, they had the nerve to charge us for our second night in a different room, and some of our thngs were gone. The manager refused to take responsibility for his untrained employees mistake, and basically told us if we didn't like his policies, we could leave. This was during baseball spring training, when rooms in the area are hard to come by. Where were we supposed to go at that hour? Stay away from this place!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place and Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Hash01
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay at this Hotel. We were driving around looking for a place to crash for a night. It was around 6-ish when we drove around the property. the outside was well lit and looked secured. We went in to ask about the rates. The lobby's decor was very good. They quoted us a rate of $60 plus tax for a Double bed and free breakfast. The manager was there and he said we wont find a better deal anywhere else so we decided to try it. Room had a cold fridge, microwave, coffee maker, I slept very well in a comfy firm bed. In the morning we went and had breakfast. They did have a nice variety of muffins and coffees. I was very impressed with the whole pool area with spa. It was very inviting so we decided to take a dip before we have to check out. Over all the hotel staff was extremely friendly, professional, and helpful. And the hotel definitely earned our future business. Excellent value for price and accommodations.

HotelInfo.Name: Budget Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 5259 W Mcdowell Rd, Phoenix, AZ 85035
